body.name: RELAX AND REPAIR Anti Aging Face Moisturizer for Men | Anti Wrinkle Cream for Face, Night Cream, Eye Cream with Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E & Ceramides For Skin
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: ⭐ADVANCED ANTI AGING TECHNOLOGY: Using the best of Korean skin care products, Relax And Repair is a clean anti-aging cream for men that may help prevent & correct fine lines + hyperpigmentation while providing all day hydration. Antioxidant rich Gotu Kola, Squalane & Ceramides reinforce skins moisture barrier, Hyaluronic Acid moisturizer deeply hydrates skin while Niacinimide is an effective pore minimizer that can help soothe blemish prone skin, reduce fine lines & wrinkles

⭐FRAGRANCE FREE LOTION FOR MEN: Our Anti-Aging face cream features high concentrations of active ingredients that aren’t overly harsh on skin. No Artificial Fragrances, Colors, Parabens or Phthalates -and it’s gluten free. It’s everything you want in a facial moisturizer, nothing you don't! Some ordinary skin care products can irritate skin. Our anti-aging cream is gentle enough for sensitive skin and can even be used as an under eye cream for dark circles and puffiness

⭐SKIN QUENCHING MOISTURE: Relax And Repair face lotion moisturizer for face is a non-greasy moisturizer for all skin types that can be used morning & night. Not water based, we use Centella Asiatica leaf water –a medicinal plant & Korean Beauty superstar ideal for face care & facial skin care products. Rich in antioxidants with regenerative properties, it yields intense hydration to soothe skin & help support collagen production like a collagen serum or collagen cream for face

⭐NON-COMEDOGENIC: The ultimate in men’s skin care, our anti-aging face cream is fast absorbing so it won’t clog pores. Both a suitable face moisturizer for oily skin or a rich face cream for dry skin, botanical Extract Pancratium Maritimum (seaweed extract) lends it brightening cream power to reduce the appearance of blemishes and dark spots while collagen boosting ingredients like hyaluronic acid make it a skin tightening firming cream for a visible face lift over time

⭐NOTICABLE RESULTS: Superior in moisturizers for face, Relax and Repair features Seaweed Extracts –a rich source of amino acids, vitamins & minerals, with anti-aging properties that help renew skin. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) and AHA Citric Acid from moringa helps break down dead skin cells, clean pores and even skin tone to soften & smooth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Relax And Repair | Ultimate Anti-Aging Moisturizer DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: Named a "best skincare product for men" by the Today Show's resident Dermatologist.CELEBRITY LOVED: Trusted by celebrities to get ready for photoshoots and red carpet events.INGREDIENTS THAT WORK: Packed with antioxidants and plant extracts clinically proven to make skin look hydrated, firm, and even-toned.AWARD WINNING: GQ 2021 Grooming Award "Best Moisturizer."

Clean, Mean, Anti-Aging Machine Prevents and corrects fine lines, uneven skin tone, and hyperpigmentation. Power packed with anti-aging antioxidants, and natural plant extracts.Clean and fragrance free. Non-greasy formula with a slightly matte finish. For men and women.
Ingredients That Work Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) to reduce pores and wrinklesCentella Asiatica to stimulate collagen Hyaluronic Acid for hydrationSqualane to firm skinCeramides to protect skin

Boom Cica Wow Shake and Wake Super Serum Rain or Shine Bro Mask Sheet Mask Bro Mask Eye Gel Pads BENEFITS Gently cleanses while nourishing and boosting your skin’s barrier. Fruit enzymes naturally and gently exfoliate skin, without harsh scrubbers. Helps even skin tone, reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation, and boost skin barrier. UVA & UVB protection to help prevent wrinkles and other signs of aging. Non-greasy, no white film and does not clog pores. Targets dull skin, redness, and fine lines. Targets puffy eyes, fine lines and dark circles. HERO INGREDIENTS Centella Asiatica, Ceramides, Malachite, Chamomile, Blueberry, Ginseng, Green Tea, Ginger, Hyaluronic Acid Papaya Enzyme, Pineapple Enzyme, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Aloe Vera, Sea Buckthorn, Prickly Pear, Japanese Bitter Orange Niacinamide, Tranexamic Acid, Vitamins C & E, Peptides, Bakuchiol, Galactomyces Ferment, Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, Centella, Green Tea, Ginger, Ginseng. Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, Licorice Root, Ginseng. Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Peptides, Green Tea, Ginger, Licorice Root, Seaweed. Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), Bakuchiol, Caffeine, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Peptides, Green Tea, Ginger, Licorice Root, Seaweed. HOW TO USE Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse thoroughly. Use morning and night. Pour dime size amount into wet hands, and rub hands together to create a creamy foam. Massage onto wet face, avoiding eyes, and rinse off completely. Use 3-4 times per week in conjuction with Boom Cica Wow gel cleanser. Dispense one pump and pat onto clean skin. Use AM & PM. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours and after swimming. Children under 6 months: Ask a doctor. Step 1: Remove both plastic films. Place mask on cleansed face, avoiding eye area. Mask pieces should overlap slightly. Smooth mask to fit skin. Step 2: Leave on for 20 minutes. Step 3: Remove mask, pat serum onto skin. Use 1-2x a week, or as needed. Wash & dry face. Apply one mask under each eye. Leave on for 15 minutes, then remove & discard. Gently pat extra serum into skin. Store eye gels in the fridge for extra cooling & de-puffing. Use once a week, or whenever you need a pick me up! FRAGRANCE FREE X X ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SERVING SIZE 3.4 FL OZ/100 ml 50g 1 FL OZ/30 ml 2.03 FL OZ/60 ml 1OZ (30g) x 4 0.11OZ (3g) x 6 TSA FRIENDLY ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Our Mission We live to create amazing skincare products, designed with men in mind. Whether it's a sheet mask that gives you an instant glow, or a sunscreen that goes on light and clear, we make products that work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This facial Moisturizer feels very good on my skin. I apply at night and have had no problems with dryness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wonderful to use
reviews.reviewText: I use mine everyday and it makes my faces look healthier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Great but not for me because it leave a bit of greasy feeling and I don't like that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Daily Face Moisturizer Now
reviews.reviewText: Skincare is a big thing for me, so I don't mind investing money into the right products like this one. 3 stars for scent because it's unscented and 3 stars for value because, honestly, it's a little pricey. Very moisturizing and leaves a matte finish on the skin; not oily at all, which is a problem I have with certain other brands. I feel confident this product has good stuff in it to protect my skin and help fend off signs of aging. For me, this product isn't a game changer but, if you're used to using low end products, this for sure will make a noticeable difference. Just purchased my 2nd bottle of this stuff a few weeks ago and I'm about 1/3rd of the way through it and still loving it. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and odorless
reviews.reviewText: My skin was tired and worn. But then...then came along Jaxon Lane Relax and Repair Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer for Men. I use it every morning and every night, and my skin feels rejuvenated and blessed with the glow of a youthful buck. I barely look a day over 400. This lotion is smooth, soft, and odorless, so I don't feel like I'm wearing some gross smelly mask - just a refreshed vibrant face that has all my friends asking "How is it that you never age?" I'll never tell...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for me...
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a number of 'Anti Aging Face Moisturizers' - cheap ones, expensive ones and some in between. This one ticks all the boxes for me and works. I especially like that it is seemingly odorless and not greasy. It absorbs quickly and feels good on the face. It also smoothed out some wrinkles which at 67 yrs old, that's a good thing. Its worth a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent but not a lot of product
reviews.reviewText: I like the moisture but i wouldn’t buy it again cause you don’t get a lot for the price. It’s kinda thick and nice as a night moisturizer. I’m oily so it was too thick for the day time
